Princess Elsa from "Frozen" and "Star Wars" villain Darth Vader were among the Disney characters the chatbot impersonated.

The senators' letter comes after NBC News reviewed dozens of driver complaints alleging Tesla’s software mishandled train crossings.

The AI creation has prompted backlash among Hollywood actors, including Whoopi Goldberg and Emily Blunt.

YouTube to pay $24 million to settle Trump lawsuit
A notice of settlement details that $22 million will go toward building a new White House ballroom.
Electronic Arts to be acquired for $52.5 billion
The deal would be the largest-ever buyout funded by private-equity firms, including Affinity Partners and Saudi Arabia's sovereign wealth fund.
